```{r}
library(tidyverse)
survivorship <- read.csv("survivorship_data_04042023.csv")
```


```{r}
survivorship %>% 
  pivot_longer(T0_mortality:T2_mortality, names_to = "TimePoint", values_to = "Binary_deadoralive") %>% 
  mutate(Binary_deadoralive = as.factor(Binary_deadoralive)) %>% 
  group_by(Genet, Transplant, TimePoint, Binary_deadoralive) %>% 
  summarize(count = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x=TimePoint,fill = Binary_deadoralive)) + geom_bar() + facet_wrap(~Transplant)
```
